snippet: Keith Olbermann, fired last week from his position at Current TV, told David Letterman that he had reservations about joining the fledgling network soon after he arrived, and thought about quitting.
abstract: Keith Olbermann, fired last week from his position at Current TV, told David Letterman that he had reservations about joining the fledgling network soon after he arrived, and thought about quitting.

headline.main: Olbermann on Joining Current TV: 'I Didn't Think the Whole Thing Through'
